        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="81413" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="81413" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.08</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="517">517</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="52"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Solaris</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Solaris</b> was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Alienor Massenet. Top notes are Neroli, Lemon and Black Currant; middle notes are Tiare Flower, Ylang-Ylang and Jasmine; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood and Cedarwood. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="81413"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.97402164791485; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.17.jpg" style="width: 3.8rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Neroli-17.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Neroli</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.94590744661054; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.77.jpg" style="width: 3.6rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lemon-77.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lemon</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.89484207200892; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.132.jpg" style="width: 3.275rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Black-Currant-132.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Black Currant</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.148.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tiare-Flower-148.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tiare Flower</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.24.jpg" style="width: 4.175rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ylang-Ylang-24.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ylang-Ylang</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.98070561712475; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.14.jpg" style="width: 3.85rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Jasmine-14.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Jasmine</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.99686027484896; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 3.975rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.89903623487364; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.33.jpg" style="width: 3.3rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sandalwood-33.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sandalwood</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.41.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cedar-41.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cedarwood</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="81413"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='90dd91403544dc442e886cbeb5b15426502' slotpayload='{"ct":"nrB3PyIEQ4FapnnDJ08zf5MsYN+HA+XQrPn2Z+pMtaTn1BUOboVvIlECUp0naR2d4K7zLQJMWV+O8CfIsglOeRK3nK\/QyxmbTp0ml4FKsiLrNGv\/I0ApT8OUqJF3uTFsfnA8ivFm9FYr7qPyQl81t8UCuDy9Jh1kWDq7+avmGrBz4dlRvMOkcTOcepcVCN6nEFfjADHtxfxiBOp0ba58TAM8vPmx1pLvwZeJcN1ttuz5miN1VLVkQ9Wj9Giysh57uLpD5cy8Fp5UX2fCP41Zf6n\/LW2EbLTDE2CL17Or+Gc3jNHSPBV0vrNMuJYt9SGr","iv":"015ceb2e2e4018eefb85dbfc56eccd6e","s":"6f92e34dfaae1f1a"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem;     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2309060" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2309060" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShooF"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShooF" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Althair-84109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Althaïr"title="Althaïr"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2309060ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2309060" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896239">ShooF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First sniff I get soap! Not sure I get any of the notes just a clean soapy smell not what I was expecting with a name like Solaris. A no for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2309060"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2309060#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244832" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244832" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Odor Aeternitatis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816990"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1816990.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Odor Aeternitatis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244832ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244832" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816990">Odor Aeternitatis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 07:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I found the combination of white flowers and vanilla very interesting in a fragrance. I know several fragrances combine white floral-vanilla with a musky base but here it's paired with creamy sandalwood. It works very well actually. This fragrance is very refined with no single notes overpowering the others, even the citrus or white floral accords. <br />
<br />
Also, I have recently seen the combination of white floral and ylang-ylang in several fragrances. The Ylang-ylang in this fragrance blended very well with the white floral-vanilla combination, pleasant and somehow unique. It's slightly sweet powdery and overall more feminine. Beautiful job.<br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2244832"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2244832#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241430" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241430" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scissorhandedly"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1270046"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1270046.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scissorhandedly" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241430ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241430" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1270046">scissorhandedly</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 02:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I know what it reminds of! It's Lush R&amp;B hair cream (I think it's called Revive now). This is basically a dupe of that scent (as the Lush one came out over 10 years ago), just smoother and better quality. Is it something divine and groundbreaking – no. But it's likeable, pretty, and uplifting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2241430"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2241430#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2238533" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2238533" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2238533ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2238533" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-04">08/04/24 07:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really loved this scent when it first came out and got a 100 ml bottle straight away. But I struggle now a bit with the black currant note which has cheap connotations and reminds me too much of Ribena, I prefer it in subtler doses like in Bal d'Afrique by Byredo. I take breaks in between using this to ensure I don't tire of the scent. About 70 ml left, which should last me a few years.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2238533"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2238533#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222256" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222256" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="beautyhabitsph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824017"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="beautyhabitsph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222256ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222256" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824017">beautyhabitsph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 07:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such a comforting scent. I like to spray it before bed and its also good for going out during the day. Its creamy, citrusy and sweet but not overly sweet. Many compares this with TF’s Soleil Blanc, i have both and to me this smells better and had better projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2222256"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2222256#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

</div></div><div id="parent2208607" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2208607" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="noahvirgile"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1864968"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1864968.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="noahvirgile" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dana/Ambush-4588.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4588.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambush"title="Ambush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2208607ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2208607" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1864968">noahvirgile</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-04">07/04/24 21:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>solar-powered white florals that melt into a sweet, creamy puddle the moment they touch your skin</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195132" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hgf2008"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2032817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hgf2008" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195132ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195132" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2032817">Hgf2008</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-21">06/21/24 08:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pleasant but not terribly exciting?<br />
<br />
The opening is a lovely sunny rush of fruits and florals. On me, it moved rapidly through to a soft vanilla - by no means unpleasant but a little generic. Compared to some of the truly superb scents that the brand has come up with (and seems to keep discontinuing - Castile! Orange blossom!), I'm not sure of this one's place in the lineup.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2195132"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2195132#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193603" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193603" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="josella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1108881"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="josella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dioramour-48397.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48397.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dioramour"title="Dioramour"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193603ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193603" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); Uplifting, happy scent. Almost like an Escada fragrance but smells expensive and luxurious. Dry down is vanilla woody, longevity is out of the world, no need for touch up at all through out the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2193603"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2193603#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178480" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The only downside... the white flowers are heavy - instant headache that persists :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2178480"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2178480#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178471" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iadoreyourdior"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346208"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="iadoreyourdior" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178471ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178471" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346208">iadoreyourdior</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 03:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Actually, it's not even close to what I expected from looking at the notes. Unluckily, I didn't get any creamy, thick flowers from this. No suntan lotion vibes. Leans on the "fresh" side.<br />
<br />
It started with a pretty sharp, citrusy opening, and then the flowers took the stage. The flower usage in this turned out quite soapy and cold, unlike her sisters' in the "This reminds me of..." section. It's like a distant Bronze Goddess. If you find the alikes too heavy for summer, this might be for you!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2178471"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2178471#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177418" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2177418" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="not-meera"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090383"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2090383.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="not-meera" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2177418ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2177418" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090383">not-meera</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-04">06/04/24 02:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Uplifting. Instantly brought to my mind the month and a half I spent in London last summer as this is what my mother wore then. Its light creaminess makes it a refreshing wear for sunny weather, like it’s name suggests. <br />
<br />
I am not usually impelled by fruity and citrusy scents, and I’ve been finding it hard recently to wear florals, but I find that Penhaligon’s does them justice for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2177418"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2177418#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2174889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2174889" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maleficent&#039;s cotton candy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1461326"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1461326.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maleficent&#039;s cotton candy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Sycomore-Eau-de-Parfum-41780.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41780.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sycomore Eau de Parfum"title="Sycomore Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2174889ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2174889" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); This smells pretty, clean, deeply floral, solar and summer-y without being gourmand or sunscreen-like. This smells expensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2174889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2174889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2163445" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2163445" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2163445ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2163445" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-21">05/21/24 14:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>By no means unique, but still a beautiful fragrance. Citrus and white flowers with a solar, tropical vibe. I was one of the first to buy a full bottle when this came out last year.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2163445"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2163445#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2161091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2161091" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tgirl1991"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659828"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1659828.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tgirl1991" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Favourite"title="The Favourite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2161091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2161091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659828">tgirl1991</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-19">05/19/24 10:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a truly beautiful fragrance - it opens on woody and powdery and then builds into citrus and vanilla. I do see that this fragrance is highly rated for longevity... but that's really only half true. If you read other reviews you will see some mixed sentiments about this. It does in fact last a long time on the skin, but the FULL fragrance does not. The beautiful full and complex aroma lasts for barely any time at all in fact - I would say less than an hour. It quickly just becomes a light vanilla, which is nice, and lasts intimately for the whole day.<br />
<br />
Scent Description: Woody Vanilla<br />
Sillage: Intimate<br />
Longevity: Full fragrance only 1hr, Vanilla undertones 6-8 hours</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2161091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2161091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158201" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2158201" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xeina89"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1744043"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1744043.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xeina89" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2158201ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2158201" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1744043">xeina89</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-16">05/16/24 13:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>عطر زهري، خشبي، فاكهي، كريمي… <br />
عطر اول ما شميته حسيته nostalgic رجعني لايام زمان… <br />
جميل، خفيف، و هادي… راقي و انيق…  <br />
بيعطني vibes كأني واقفة تحت ضو الشمس،وعيوني مسكرين وراسي مرفوع… وببعد عني كل الأفكار السلبية... <br />
  هالعطر سهل الاستخدام... و مناسب جداً للربيع والصيف ❤️<br />
<br />
follow me @by.zeinaa</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2158201"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2158201#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128373" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amnebe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1645213.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amnebe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floral-Street/Wild-Vanilla-Orchid-47212.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47212.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wild Vanilla Orchid"title="Wild Vanilla Orchid"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128373ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128373" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213">amnebe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 07:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is nothing like what I expected; it's better. It has some of the same vibes as Penhaligon's Heartless Helen and ELDO's She Was an Anomaly with a green tangerine and tuberose note. Neither of those scent notes are among the listed ones though. What really sets this one apart is an ethereal, floaty floral quality that seems to glow around this fragrance. The image of the sun rays on the packaging kind of capture this, but it's more of a soft glowing halo like around a full eclipse. To understand how that's a scent, you'll have to try it. I'm not sure what scent notes are making this happen, but it's just gorgeous, calming, and happy-making. It only lasts a couple of hours (like lots of Penhaglion fragrances), so plan to need to refresh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2128373"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2128373#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115341" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2115341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2115341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2114264" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2114264" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rozalina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243220"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1243220.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rozalina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2114264ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2114264" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243220">Rozalina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-04">04/04/24 11:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like to pretend this was named after the Tarkovsky film, lol. Anyway, Solaris starts off as a lovely, very cheerful and uplifting orange blossom fragrance (yes, I know it's not listed but that must be how the lemon and neroli come across on my skin). One minute, you're frolicking in the sun, and the next...nothing. I think this gave me one to two hours of wear and then it's not even a skin scent. I also do not find the DNA of this very unique or necessary in my collection. It reminds me of something from the Nuxe line of perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2114264"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2114264#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2093591" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2093591" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Seniusscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2043314"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2043314.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Seniusscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2093591ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2093591" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); Love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2093591"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2093591#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2087023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2087023" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="madameoiselledarling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872361"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1872361.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="madameoiselledarling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2087023ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2087023" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872361">madameoiselledarling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-09">03/09/24 07:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this in a bulk order a few months ago from Penhaligon’s. I ignored it at first – too bright, much too bright for me. Then today, on an overcast and grey day in early March, when I was feeling a little depressed, I thought I’d have another go at it. After reading the notes of vanilla and sandalwood, two of my favourites, and it smelt beautiful. I applied more and closed my eyes and felt transported to an old country house, surrounded by fields of bright yellow flowers, looking through French doors with billowing white curtains and happy children in white linen clothes running in and out. Wicker baskets filled with fresh produce. A garden filled with wildflowers and baby ducks. A kitchen window with a freshly baked tarte au citron cooling. La Bohème by Charles Aznavour playing softly on a vintage record player.<br />
<br />
Apologies for the soliloquy; but I had to demonstrate just how taken I was with this scent on secondary inspection. All the ingredients sing to create a joyful, warm, sweet, and familiar bouquet. A symphony that smells like my romanticised idea of motherhood. It’s seriously beautiful. It would be perfect with some more sillage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2087023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2087023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051372" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2051372" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mbetserai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1016751"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1016751.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mbetserai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mind-Games/French-Defense-88867.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88867.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="French Defense"title="French Defense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2051372ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2051372" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1016751">mbetserai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-03">02/03/24 16:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay, a quick edit. I mean for real if gardenia isn't your thing. Take a HARD PASS. It dies down a bit after about 3 hours but the opening is all gardenia, all day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2051372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2051372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018040" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2018040" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cassiano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/6218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.6218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cassiano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Spicy-Aoud-41075.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41075.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicy Aoud"title="Spicy Aoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2018040ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2018040" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/6218">Cassiano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-02">01/02/24 13:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly, I don't get the "unfinished" adjective people gave to it!<br />
Solaris is a beautiful floral-fruity fragrance, with no tuberose at all, but a juice ylang-ylang with a bright tiare + neroli combo and a salty vanilla dry down. <br />
More feminine indeed, but way more luminous than Terracotta, for instance. <br />
I really liked it! 👋🏻🇧🇷</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2018040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2018040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2007821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2007821" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Narwhal544"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1911112"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1911112.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Narwhal544" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2007821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2007821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1911112">Narwhal544</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-22">12/22/23 06:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Warm citrus with a soft suncream scent. I love this smell. I find it's very nostalgic, reminding me of some bath oils I had when I was a child.<br />
<br />
It opens with a suncream smell that dries down to a more citrus-y vanilla. Lasts around 6 hours on me. Cosy, summer-y, and comfortable. I would recommend :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2007821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2007821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1958826" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1958826" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fourleafedrover8"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1762926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1762926.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fourleafedrover8" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1958826ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1958826" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1762926">fourleafedrover8</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-23">10/23/23 06:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume has the very mature qualities of white florals in French perfumery. In layman's terms: it smells like an older woman in the way only perfumes like the Chanel classics can embody. As a freshie lover, I have smelled many a summer scent from crisp linen Kurkjians to oh-so-blue aquatics. This is not a summer scent to me at all, but a posh, ultra mature, ultra floral gut-punch that would definitely be on the wrist of the normal clientele of Penhaligons. This woman shops at Waitrose. She is over 50. She sees her hairstylist twice weekly. Her shoes match her handbag. <br />
<br />
It is a potent, very layered floral. If you can imagine a mix between Chanel No 5 and Gucci's Floral Gorgeous Gardenia, you'll have Solaris. It's old-fashioned and non-innovative, and I feel like other more reasonably priced designer perfumers could deliver this to you if this is your kind of perfume. <br />
<br />
As always a disclaimer for my fellow scent-sensitive girlies: put down the Solaris. Instant sore-throat/headache combo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1958826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1958826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1951824" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1951824" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DuftHexe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656531"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1656531.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DuftHexe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1951824ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1951824" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656531">DuftHexe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-14">10/14/23 12:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ordered a 2mL decant from Lucky Scent.  WOW!  It was like going back in time…to when I was 14 years old and Momma gave me my first bottle of fragrance…White Shoulders by Evyan.  Solaris is a dead ringer…especially the opening and white floral notes.  Not my style (as an adult).  VERY old school floral.  NOTHING unique with this fragrance.  IF you do not absolutely love and intense floral fragrance with strong notes of white flowers and ylang, ylang, take a pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1951824"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1951824#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946233" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1946233" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maya lilac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maya lilac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1946233ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1946233" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079">Maya lilac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-07">10/07/23 07:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Solaris opens with the most realistic smelling lemon! The zingy acidic smell lasts only for about two minutes then it has a slightly weird, somewhat soapy green smell until it settles into the warmest, sweetest ylang ylang, tiare and jasmine combo. Vanilla and sandalwood are in the background in Solaris, the flowers are playing the main role!<br />
<br />
It’s not 100% the typical tropical floral scent, it has a twist that makes it more unique than the others in this vein. It might be the added blackcurrant in the composition that kinda ruins it for me. There’s something in here that’s bothering my nose. <br />
<br />
I love the opening but the dry down is not quite where I want it to be to make me splurge for a full bottle. It’s Penhaligon’s so it’s pricey.<br />
<br />
Moderate longevity and silage. <br />
<br />
The bottle and the box are the typical Penhaligon’s style, simple and elegant but with a sunny brownish/yellowish colour to it.<br />
<br />
I kind of want it, but I think I need to get decant to get my mind around this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1946233"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1946233#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1939565" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1939565" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emerson10"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238550"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="emerson10" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/ALTAIA/Don-t-Cry-For-Me-32343.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32343.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Don't Cry For Me"title="Don't Cry For Me"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1939565ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1939565" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238550">emerson10</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-28">09/28/23 12:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starchy pleasant citrus. When I was a kid, there was this glitter gel I used to play with. It smelled floral, gluey, and a little soapy, and this is reminding me so much of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1939565"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1939565#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1929926" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1929926" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sparris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/291939"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.291939.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sparris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Eau-des-Merveilles-9.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau des Merveilles"title="Eau des Merveilles"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1929926ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1929926" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);
