align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1920906"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1920906#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1912113" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1912113" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="that1makeupgirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/893154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="that1makeupgirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1912113ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1912113" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/893154">that1makeupgirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-26">08/26/23 11:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My go-to summer fragrance. It gives a hint but doesn't overdo anything: not too much sunscreen, not too much white floral, not too much vanilla... just right! The smell reminds me of Nuxe products. I like to apply this after I've put on the shimmer body oil for the perfect summer evening. LOVE.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1912113"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1912113#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1903459" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378612">Diajanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-16">08/16/23 06:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My scent preferences has evolved as I’m into citrusy and rose perfumes lately. This as one summer citrusy smell I just had to have it! My daily go to work scent but not my work scent. That’s where my Dior jadore Leau comes in.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1903459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1903459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1897432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1897432" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mbetserai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1016751"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1016751.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mbetserai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mind-Games/French-Defense-88867.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88867.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="French Defense"title="French Defense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1897432ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1897432" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1016751">mbetserai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-08">08/08/23 19:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just received it today and the more I play with it, the more notes I pick up. I smell the jasmine, vanilla, wood and a whiff of lemon. It is complex but smells nostalgic to me. And by old I don't mean mature, I mean it reminds me of fragrances my mother's friends wore. Because my mother hated heavy florals, especially gardenia and jasmine. But it's a love for me! As the evening plays out, more and more notes develop.  Finally,  I know I see a lot of people saying this seems to be a daytime fragrance,  not for me, with that rich, hothouse, summertime white floral,  it is a summer night fragrance to me. 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1897432"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1897432#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1896182" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1896182" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sunnyviolets"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1459768.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sunnyviolets" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1896182ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1896182" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459768">sunnyviolets</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-07">08/07/23 08:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Agreed, this is a perfect summer perfume. It isn't your generic white floral. It ever so slightly reminds me of Bobbi Brown's Beach and Soleil Blanc, but it's more sophisticated. Mostly this reminds me of a flower shop, the cold air from opening one of the refrigerators mingling with the warm air from the open door on a bright summer day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1896182"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1896182#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1895550" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1895550" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Miumori"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227902"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Miumori" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1895550ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1895550" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227902">Miumori</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-06">08/06/23 08:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>THIS IS THE PERFECT SUMMER PERFUME! It starts off with citrusy sour fruity scent and quickly develops into warm floral kinda smells like expensive sunscreen (in a good way). So this is something that you would wanna wear to the beach or summer vacation to tropical countries. It kinda reminds me with tom ford soleil blanc but this one is more sweet and floral, soleil blanc is not sweet and is unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1895550"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1895550#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1889819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1889819" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="verzosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/239364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.239364.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="verzosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Galop-d-Hermes-39584.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39584.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Galop d'Hermes"title="Galop d'Hermes"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1889819ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1889819" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/239364">verzosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-29">07/29/23 09:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm not one to go for fragrances described as tropical or beachy because I live in a very dry climate. In my search for white florals, I figured it would be a good contrast to my surroundings. The beachy quality doesn't scream, but like other reviewers have mentioned it does have a sunscreen vibe to it; to my nose it's very refined and subtle. I believe Solaris exudes the spirit of summer.<br />
<br />
This scent made me realize how much I love black currant as a note. Upon first application I was introduced to an unquestionable burst of expertly blended neroli and black currant with soft citrus. The smooth mixture of the flowers (the tiare being the most prominent) come into play, still working together with the opening notes. I don't get much sandalwood during the drydown. However, as the perfume draws to its conclusion the florals, black currant and neroli whisper with a soft lick of vanilla. This perfume has a powderiness I don't find overwhelming; I love Penhaligon's use of powder and in here it's executed exceptionally well.<br />
<br />
Solaris is a must try for those seeking white florals and/or something modestly tropical. This was such an successful blind buy. It has become one of the best casual and summer appropriate scents I've come across hands down. I am already looking at the future hoping this never gets discontinued.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1889819"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1889819#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1885116" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1885116" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dreamypepper"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1798718"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1798718.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dreamypepper" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Bluebell-4535.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4535.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bluebell"title="Bluebell"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1885116ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1885116" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1798718">dreamypepper</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-23">07/23/23 07:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i became obsessed with this one when i sampled it at the airport! i love how the black currant comes through as its one of my favorite fruits and scents, and this perfume reminds me so much of walking through a berry garden- a very natural scent- not in the way of skin but in the way of nature ♡ i bought it immediately</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1885116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1885116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1884576" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1884576" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lord Lucan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532517"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1532517.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lord Lucan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Marylebone-Wood-49654.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49654.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Marylebone Wood"title="Marylebone Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1884576ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1884576" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532517">Lord Lucan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-22">07/22/23 12:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do not think this perfume remind me of the sun all of summer, it is quite specific in its fragrances. I felt it had a very common breeze like mint like fragrance to it which stands out the most and that is no different to any shower gel I have used.  I had heard so much about this so much hype about Solaris and to finally have it in a 30 ml, I am I have to admit, I am quite disappointed. Not one I will be keeping.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1884576"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1884576#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880482" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1880482" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CoastStarlight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1751391"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1751391.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CoastStarlight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Anka-Kus-Parfuem/Jezebel-64195.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64195.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jezebel"title="Jezebel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1880482ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1880482" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1751391">CoastStarlight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-17">07/17/23 02:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was an instant love for me--it smells like warmth and sunshine and happiness. It opens warm and bright, in a sun-drenched orchard with showers of white florals, with a little soapy freshness from the neroli, then progresses into the sweetly rich indolic tiare flower, which--full disclosure--is a note that totally agrees with my skin, very "my skin but better." I would push woody way down on the accords list because on me this is just a solar bomb of sunshiney citrus and white and yellow florals before drying down into a soft powdery sandalwood (but not too powdery, my fellow powder-haters, although also not as woody as I would like). Genuinely a fragrance that makes me feel happier every time I spray it. If you like Musicology's Sun Goddess but wish the florals in it were a little louder, this is the one for you!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1880482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1880482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1877724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1877724" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kalendra1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1427579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1427579.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kalendra1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1877724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1877724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1427579">Kalendra1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-13">07/13/23 07:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Terracotta + Bronze Goddess + Nuit de Tubereuse L'Artisan. Even Love Don't Be Shy Extreme By Kilian vibes for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1877724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1877724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1876385" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1876385" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ilikewhatilike"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516720"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1516720.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ilikewhatilike" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1876385ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1876385" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516720">Ilikewhatilike</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-11">07/11/23 13:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells beachy to me. I enjoy the fresh juicy opening with the citrus and black currant. In the dry down, it goes more sunscreeny, but this isn’t bad. I think the added freshness is a great addition to this type of scent profile, which tends to get a bit overwhelming for me (and headache inducing), so that’s a positive for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1876385"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1876385#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1863730" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Can’t relate to anything so far but it’s harsh and green and very soapy like hand wash… I don’t like nor dislike it’s just “nah” - boring.<br />
<br />
It smoothes after some minutes and I can only smell Jasmin Noir by Bulgary… It’s a dupe.<br />
<br />
Tomorrow I’ll try it again. Perhaps I’m more lucky and get some tiare which was what hoped for. Some disappointed :/</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1863730"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1863730#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1862654" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1862654" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xela_529"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1545982.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xela_529" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ella-K-Parfums/Melodie-D-Altai-48471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Melodie D'Altai"title="Melodie D'Altai"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1862654ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1862654" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982">Xela_529</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-23">06/23/23 02:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Man this one confuses me! I do not get tropical florals or sunscreen vibes one bit. Terracotta is one of my all time favs and this is nothing like her. Ironically, I get the same DNA as Sintra! I swear, am I the only one? I smelled Solaris twice to confirm. It’s like Sintra but instead of orange blossom it’s neroli, jasmine, and a hint of Tiare. The black current gives it that juicy affect as in Sintra. I don’t get any ylang-ylang at all, which is a bummer for me because I love the eternal yellow flower. I also find the lemon to be too sharp. <br />
<br />
It’s not bad but for what it is I’d rather wear Sintra or Oriana if I wanted something with that DNA.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1862654"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1862654#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1858042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1858042" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amanda0727"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583049"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="amanda0727" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-78656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance"title="Guidance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1858042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1858042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583049">amanda0727</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-16">06/16/23 16:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My my isn't this similar to L'Artisan's Soleil de Provence which I already own. However this one is more tropical, fresher and less floral. The neroli is really well done here. In hindsight I would have passed on Soleil de Provence if I already had this, as I prefer this one a lot more. However the performance on this one is really bad so it may not be redundant to have both :). Such a cute bottle too! This is a house that just KNOWS the art of packaging. <br />
<br />
In summary, it is a love for me ❤️. I have found THE beachy tropical fragrance for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1858042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1858042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1856645" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Gorgeous bottle!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1851134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1851134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1848420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1192947">kyrakirana77</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-03">06/03/23 16:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After testing this for few times<br />
I would say , Solaris is my new jam for summer<br />
Blackcurrants give hint the acidity, whilst tiare and ylang ylang are the main character in this perfume<br />
Its giving me sunscreen kinda vibe but in good way, with hint of sweetness from vanilla.<br />
My sister in law told me , that she can smell me from downstairs (its 4 hours after full wear, 10 sprays mind u)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1848298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1848298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1827026" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1827026"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1827026#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1824769" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1824769" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mew4292"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/71656"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.71656.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mew4292" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42702.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Savoy Steam"title="Savoy Steam"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1824769ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1824769" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/71656">mew4292</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-04">05/04/23 10:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Can definitely get the scents of fresh and juicy blackcurrant, citrus lemon, and neroli mix blooming from the start. It then quickly turns into white floral scent with ylang-ylang and tiare flower taking dominant and little blackcurrant laying at the back. Cannot really detect vanilla but cedarwood and sandalwood are both laying down quietly in the mix with floral almost powdery scent. A very fresh and enjoyable unisex summer fragrance and considering this is a special edition perfume being made in Spain instead of England from Penhaligon's collection. Imagine yourself on holiday walking under the sun in heated Spain and Italy...or on the field in the vineyard during the grape harvest period. Spray on clothes and it should linger for around half a day. Lively and sunshine in a bottle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1824769"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1824769#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1824701" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1824701" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vitodito"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1303546"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1303546.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vitodito" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1824701ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1824701" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1303546">Vitodito</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-04">05/04/23 09:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried at the store today. <br />
<br />
Brilliant launch by Penhaligon’s, this smells very solar and bright, happy. Smells like you’re between jasmines and a beach.<br />
<br />
Loads of natural jasmine and yellow powder given by the ylang ylang. <br />
<br />
The tiaré gives that sun tan lotion vibe, beach vibes, and the vanilla in the background, mixed with the flowers, reminds me of a more delicate and floral version of rosendo mateu 5. <br />
<br />
Spot on, more on the feminine side.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1824701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1824701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1823953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-03">05/03/23 10:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The lemon in this is soft and delicate, almost like a lemon meringue pie. Kind of like Sal y Limon by Carner Barcelona. The tiare flower in this is beautiful and with the ylang-ylang it has a creamy banana accord. Good scent for summer and I caved into buying a fb. If anyone in the U.K. wants decants, there are some available through the Facebook group Penhaligon’s Fan &amp; Buy and Sell Group which has some great deals.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I am a big fan of Le Lys by Le Labo and I would definitely put them in the same family of warm, summery scents. Something so feminine and delicate in these frags : ylang ylang, white flowers and a bit of zest is a perfect combination for a ‘feel good’ frag! Id say it’s a very safe buy for those who love florals</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1821675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1821675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent2018040" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2018040" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cassiano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/6218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.6218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cassiano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Spicy-Aoud-41075.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41075.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicy Aoud"title="Spicy Aoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2018040ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2018040" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/6218">Cassiano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-02">01/02/24 13:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly, I don't get the "unfinished" adjective people gave to it!<br />
Solaris is a beautiful floral-fruity fragrance, with no tuberose at all, but a juice ylang-ylang with a bright tiare + neroli combo and a salty vanilla dry down. <br />
More feminine indeed, but way more luminous than Terracotta, for instance. <br />
I really liked it! 👋🏻🇧🇷</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2018040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2018040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2087023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2087023" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="madameoiselledarling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872361"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1872361.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="madameoiselledarling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2087023ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2087023" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872361">madameoiselledarling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-09">03/09/24 07:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this in a bulk order a few months ago from Penhaligon’s. I ignored it at first – too bright, much too bright for me. Then today, on an overcast and grey day in early March, when I was feeling a little depressed, I thought I’d have another go at it. After reading the notes of vanilla and sandalwood, two of my favourites, and it smelt beautiful. I applied more and closed my eyes and felt transported to an old country house, surrounded by fields of bright yellow flowers, looking through French doors with billowing white curtains and happy children in white linen clothes running in and out. Wicker baskets filled with fresh produce. A garden filled with wildflowers and baby ducks. A kitchen window with a freshly baked tarte au citron cooling. La Bohème by Charles Aznavour playing softly on a vintage record player.<br />
<br />
Apologies for the soliloquy; but I had to demonstrate just how taken I was with this scent on secondary inspection. All the ingredients sing to create a joyful, warm, sweet, and familiar bouquet. A symphony that smells like my romanticised idea of motherhood. It’s seriously beautiful. It would be perfect with some more sillage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2087023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2087023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1824701" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1824701" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vitodito"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1303546"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1303546.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vitodito" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1824701ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1824701" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1303546">Vitodito</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-04">05/04/23 09:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried at the store today. <br />
<br />
Brilliant launch by Penhaligon’s, this smells very solar and bright, happy. Smells like you’re between jasmines and a beach.<br />
<br />
Loads of natural jasmine and yellow powder given by the ylang ylang. <br />
<br />
The tiaré gives that sun tan lotion vibe, beach vibes, and the vanilla in the background, mixed with the flowers, reminds me of a more delicate and floral version of rosendo mateu 5. <br />
<br />
Spot on, more on the feminine side.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1824701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1824701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1821675" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1821675" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sdevyatova"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/424281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.424281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sdevyatova" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Lyra-Peach-91089.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91089.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lyra Peach "title="Lyra Peach "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1821675ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1821675" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/424281">sdevyatova</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-30">04/30/23 13:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So my husband got this one for me as per recommendation of a SA at the boutique and let me tell you, as soon as I sprayed it I have been obsessed! I am a big fan of Le Lys by Le Labo and I would definitely put them in the same family of warm, summery scents. Something so feminine and delicate in these frags : ylang ylang, white flowers and a bit of zest is a perfect combination for a ‘feel good’ frag! Id say it’s a very safe buy for those who love florals</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1821675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1821675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2007821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2007821" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Narwhal544"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1911112"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1911112.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Narwhal544" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2007821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2007821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1911112">Narwhal544</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-22">12/22/23 06:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Warm citrus with a soft suncream scent. I love this smell. I find it's very nostalgic, reminding me of some bath oils I had when I was a child.<br />
<br />
It opens with a suncream smell that dries down to a more citrus-y vanilla. Lasts around 6 hours on me. Cosy, summer-y, and comfortable. I would recommend :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="2007821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=2007821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="81413" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1958826" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1958826" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fourleafedrover8"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1762926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1762926.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fourleafedrover8" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1958826ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1958826" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1762926">fourleafedrover8</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-23">10/23/23 06:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume has the very mature qualities of white florals in French perfumery. In layman's terms: it smells like an older woman in the way only perfumes like the Chanel classics can embody. As a freshie lover, I have smelled many a summer scent from crisp linen Kurkjians to oh-so-blue aquatics. This is not a summer scent to me at all, but a posh, ultra mature, ultra floral gut-punch that would definitely be on the wrist of the normal clientele of Penhaligons. This woman shops at Waitrose. She is over 50. She sees her hairstylist twice weekly. Her shoes match her handbag. <br />
<br />
It is a potent, very layered floral. If you can imagine a mix between Chanel No 5 and Gucci's Floral Gorgeous Gardenia, you'll have Solaris. It's old-fashioned and non-innovative, and I feel like other more reasonably priced designer perfumers could deliver this to you if this is your kind of perfume. <br />
<br />
As always a disclaimer for my fellow scent-sensitive girlies: put down the Solaris. Instant sore-throat/headache combo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1958826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1958826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1884576" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1884576" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lord Lucan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532517"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1532517.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lord Lucan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Marylebone-Wood-49654.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49654.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Marylebone Wood"title="Marylebone Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1884576ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1884576" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532517">Lord Lucan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-22">07/22/23 12:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do not think this perfume remind me of the sun all of summer, it is quite specific in its fragrances. I felt it had a very common breeze like mint like fragrance to it which stands out the most and that is no different to any shower gel I have used.  I had heard so much about this so much hype about Solaris and to finally have it in a 30 ml, I am I have to admit, I am quite disappointed. Not one I will be keeping.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81413"comment_id="1884576"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Solaris-81413.html?ccid=1884576#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1920906" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
